name: Diabolix Bottle Opener - A di Alessi
description:
What a little devil! Use this laughing bottle-opener by Alessi at dinner with your friends and hope he won't play any tricks! BPA-free.

Usually ships in 1 business day.

Bottle opener in thermoplastic resin.

- Brand: A di Alessi
- Colors: Red, Black, Yellow, Green, Blue
- Size: 7" x 2.25"
- Material: Thermoplastic resin
- Boxed
- Alessi's Item Code: ABC01 R (Red), ABC01 B (Black), ABC01 Y (Yellow), ABC01 GR (Green), ABC01 AZ (Blue).
- Design CSA, Biagio Cisotti, 1997.

(Blue, Yellow, Green, Black images coming soon).

name: Seasonal Pieni Unikko Apron - Marimekko
description:
Featuring brightly colored patterns from Finland's Marimekko, these aprons are fun to wear while baking and cooking.

The placement of the pattern on the apron will vary.

Usually ships in 1 business day.

- Brand: Marimekko
- Pattern: Pieni Unikko
- Pattern Designer: Maija Isola & Kristina Isola
- Material:  100% cotton
- Marimekko's Item Number: 064161-820

name: Ringo Ring Holder - Koziol
description:
Mice are not always welcome in real life, but this mouse is sure to be a favorite. Ringo's long tail provides storage for numerous rings, while its ears have holes to hold a pair of earrings.

Usually ships in 1 business day.

- Brand: Koziol
- Color: Transparent Plum, Clear
- Size: 1.8" x 2.6" x 7.3" high
- Material: PMMA
- Made in Germany

(Clear not pictured).

name: Fairy Kitchen Towel - Garnier-Thiebaut
description:
Since 1833, Garnier-Thiebaut has been designing and weaving the most beautiful damask cotton home linen for all interiors. These stunning towels are woven in the jacquard technique in France's Vosges region. The woven patterns won't fade with use or exposure to sunlight. Great for cheerful decoration and tough enough for cleaning and dish drying.

Sold individually.
Exact coloring may vary from what is shown in picture.

Usually ships in 1 business day.

- Brand: Garnier-Thiebaut
- Pattern: Fairy
- Color Scheme: Cracker
- Size: 22" x 30"
- Material: 100% Cotton
- Made in France

name: Rocker Garlic Crusher - Joseph Joseph
description:
Use this stylish tool to break up garlic cloves quickly and easily. When a rocking motion is applied to the crusher, it will force the garlic through the holes in the center. The curved design will then catch and hold the garlic pieces for easy transfer to a bowl or pot. The stainless steel helps reduce any garlic odor left on the hands and fingers. Simply rinse the Rocker under running water while gently rubbing the surface of the skin.

Usually ships in 1 business day.

- Brand: Joseph Joseph
- Size: 7.3" x 1.6" x 1.2" high
- Material: Stainless steel
- Design Goodwin Hartshorn
